评论详情: Good purchase for me, I ordered another color while they are still available. After reading the reviews I followed their advice and ordered up two sizes from normal 2xl for my 43" bust. If they listed 3x it would have a loose fit. As it came it was good but not much extra room. The material is a little felt like and a slightly stiff but not annoying for me. It's cool weather it is a nice warm layer. It is a little thicker than I expected, not thick, but not a T shirt material either. The Peacock color is like the photo and exactly what I wanted. The sizing issue is my only complaint and the reviews prevented it from being a issue. A physical measurement from arm pit to arm pit and shoulder to hem might have made the choice easier to decide. International sizing and S-M-L etc are so inconsistent it must be the cause of most of the online shopping returns. Edit: The second one was as nice as the first. Both survived a gentle wash and air dry. I didn't want it to shrink and it's good. The fabric was slightly stiff and became softer after the gentle cold water wash. The Khaki color is like the photo and is softer after the wash, I've decided to treat them gently because I would like to keep them nice and not ware them out too soon. I also bought the full zip jacket and it was just a nice. I appreciate the zipper pockets in the jacket. The jacket is available in more sizes and it is consistent with the pullover size.

评论概述: A little snug but a keeper
评论详情: I'm 5'2" 138 lbs and a true medium. This was a little snug for a true medium but I feel a large would look too big. A nice summer yellow. I like the heather yellow look and super soft. Fits at the shoulders and arm length.
I usually take a L but ordered a XL and its even too small.  Im disappointed.  Its nice, I will think about ordering a size larger but it goes against the grain.

Based on other reviews, I ordered the medium and it's a good fit. I haven't yet washed/worn it. For layering in this cold weather climate, I'll likely order again in a larger size since I usually wear turtlenecks in the winter.
I wear this when it is cold out and it is very nice.
Love the fit. The fabric has an odd feeling to it.

This is a lovely mid-light weight top that is very versatile.  It's great for working out, but is pretty enough to wear out to lunch or running errands.  The fabric has decent stretch to it but is not as stretchy as some other shirts of this type.
Tan Color was oddly pink and size medium was too snug
Work on sizing!
The top was very soft and comfortable. I had hoped the material would have been a little heavier. I haven’t washed it yet so I cannot comment on its durability.
Color was brighter than expected but everything else was fine
I ordered a large, was sent an XL..pretty color and as pictured.
Too long and I am 5’7”. Not much give. Bit restricting. Warm!
The fabric is a little stiffer feeling and not as soft as other fleece tops, but it's comfortable.

Product is heavy and did wash ok but material feels like felt.  It is also just as stiff.  If you want something just for warmth and don't care about how it looks quality-wise, this would work.  I will just wear it around the house.

This is a warm and soft pull-over. I purchased a medium which is snug through the chest but perfect fit in shoulders & arms. If layering, I would get a large. Color is same as pictured. Will purchase a second color!

Love this top.  Went up a size as I wanted it to be over my hips. XXL perfect fit.  Bought a navy oneas well.  I won't put in dryer but with this size in an ecowarm wash a little shrinkage won't be aproblem.  Good buy
Soft warm easy fit. Wore as. Second layer in Alaska. Didn't need base layer if temps were in the 20's. Washes well. I bought two.
Hopefully this top will fit alright, but on initial viewing, it looks grey not green as advertised. I'm still not sure if we're keeping this or sending it back.
Nice weight and color but the XL was way to small and had to return.  Suggest order a size up.
The color, fabric and fit of this shirt is great and I plan to purchase another in a different color.  It hangs well and so far is holding up well.
Soft and well made.
I ordered a 2X but couldn't even get it on.  It is more like a Large. Not a lot of stretch.  It's going back.
This was described as wine.  It is, in fact, rust colored with black specks all through.  The rust color has an orange tint.  So disappointed.
This was not navy, tight and disappointed. Returned this.

This MAGCOMSEN Polar Fleece Pullover Jacket is very nice.  The fabric is so soft and cozy and the color is beautiful.  It's a half zip style that makes it so much easier to get on and off than a typical hoodie.  The only issue I have is that the fit is definitely on the small side.  I went up a size and the fit is still snug.  It's too snug to wear anything under it, so I'm not sure it qualifies as a jacket.  However, as a stand alone sweatshirt, it's very comfortable and stylish.

评论概述: A bit small and not much stretch
评论详情: This is a nice pull over but don’t skimp on size.  Order up a size if you plan to wear more than a thin shirt under it.  It is a close fit and the material doesn’t stretch much at all.  It has a good cut that is attractive when worn.  The shirt is well made and the zipper is of good quality.  It is a bit pricier than I’d usually pay for this type of shirt from an off brand.  It’s a good buy but make sure you know the sizing.

This is a tight fitting jacket.  I may have to size up, because I'm a 32G and size 4 but this was really snug and I realize my natural bust isn't the norm, but if you'd like some breathing room, size up if you're large busted.  It's pretty but was a lighter color than picture, like turquoise is what I'd say.  It's soft and cozy for sure.  Where are the pockets as well? Women need pockets too!

This is a generic pullover. The fleece isn't as soft as I'd like, but maybe it will soften up after a few washes.  The color is pretty and it seems like it will be warm for when the weather turns brisk.

评论概述: A GOOD TOP FOR THE FALL
评论详情: This pullover fleece top is good for the Fall since it's warm but it's not too heavy. The material could be a little softer though. As far as its design, you can wear it with the collar up or down. The zipper feels sturdy and it works well. I ordered my regular size and it fits me; however, it looks more contoured online than it actually is. As far as washing it, even though it says online "hand wash", I washed mine in the washing machine on delicate cycle and dried in my dryer and it came out just fine. I chose the color "Water Blue" and it's a beautiful shade of blue, like the Mediterranean Sea. This top looks good with jeans or leggings.

评论概述: Fit is good, fabric is itchy.
评论详情: This fit to size, so that's good. Order your normal size. But the material was itchy.  Not a huge fan. Was hoping this would be a nice layer for travel but ended up not taking it.

I almost can't wait until winter and I'm not a fan of cold weather.  This top is so pretty. I ordered the water blue and it's a beautiful blue.  This top is well made. No skipped seams and the stitching is well done.  What I really love about this top is how warm and cozy it feels.  The fabric is super soft.  This top would be great for those cool fall evenings.  This one is easy to wear and easy to love.  Pair it with jeans and head out to run errands or pair it with some yoga pants for hanging out at home.  Super comfy! Really flattering.  I highly recommend this top.  I hope this was helpful.

评论概述: Soft and fuzzy fleece quarter zip top
评论详情: This top runs a little on the small side, so you might want to order up a size (or two if you want to wear it over a shirt). I ordered a large (I'm usually a medium) and it is pretty fitted.  The fleece is thick and soft. Wish it had pockets, but that's not a deal breaker for me. Comes in a variety of beautiful colors so you should be able to find a color that works for you.  Nice top!

I like this top. I can see it being worn alone or as a pullover. I ordered a small, I am 5'2", 135lb and it was fitted on me but not too tight where id be uncomfortable. I wear a 34g and it was fitted. I actually got it for my daughter who is 5'3" 145 and a 34d. I will attach photos of her. Its a little more relaxed on her.
Comfy and perfect for fall

I recommended getting a large if you like to wear undershirt. I'm 5'2 151lbs, I prefer to have room to feel comfortable. I walk in the mornings it gets cold so wearing this kept me warm. The material is soft and thick! I love the color.

This sweater fits true to size. I ordered a medium and it is a good fit. It is warm and the stand-up collar is particularly comfortable. It has washed well. It fits long on my 5’2 frame, which would be a good thing for anyone taller than me who does not want a cropped effect.

I ordered several of these in different colours - true to size - I wear a M (size 10) and these fit perfectly and  don't shrink.  Fall to the the hips, not too baggy, not too tight.  Really warm as well.
Almost too warm! Lovely shade of pink and fits nicely. Definitely would purchase again.
The fabric is soft and of good quality.  It is a better option than other more expensive designer brands.  Washes well
I searched for a fleece pullover for my upcoming trip to UK, something to pull on if cool without having to wear a coat/jacket.  This will do the trick
Thr sweater fits fine but the sleeves are so tight I have to return it.
